thread.section_title: Store DJ Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Store DJ | storedj.com.au
thread.title: Anon

author: Anon
title: Anon
text:
I've purchased from StoreDJ several times over the past few years. Both online and in person (Brisbane), i've received impeccable customer service from knowledgable staff, who've helped me find the right product to fit my needs and seem to genuinely care about helping me get what I need.
However, i've previously purchased products from them online and, whilst their staff always call to keep me in the loop, products have been delayed a few weeks several times. I am currently waiting on one now which is 2 days late from their stated delivery time. Products always arrive in good condition, it's just a delay in delivery time.
